authors.author: One Hope Project. Joe Wells and Dan Gray 2010

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A place to find comfort, a place to find peace
Where we see your mercy, I'm covered by grace

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You made a way, when there was no way, there was no way
You made a way when there was no way, there was no way

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You tore the veil, and I'm welcomed in.
To enter Your throne room, with no weight of sin
I sit at Your feet Lord, where I'm truly free
My life in the Truth, Your awesome Love for me

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
There's Glory in this place, and power in Your name
Where all can find healing, here Jesus You reign

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
There is nothing in this world, no powers above or below
Nothing in all of creation, that will take me from Your love
